GS41bijaganu:1: BG_1a/ utpādakam yad pravadanti buddhes adhiṣṭhitam sat-puruṣeṇa sāṃkhyās/
GS41bijaganu:2: BG_1c/ vyaktasya kṛtsnasya tad eka-bījam avyaktam īśam gaṇitam ca vande//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:3: BG_2a/ pūrvam proktam vyaktam avyakta-bījam prāyas praśnās no vinā avyakta-yuktyā/
GS41bijaganu:4: BG_2c/ jñātum śakyās manda-dhībhis nitāntam yasmāt tasmāt vacmi bīja-kriyām ca//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:5: BG_3/ yoge yutis syāt kṣayayos svayos vā dhana-ṛṇayos antaram eva yogas/
GS41bijaganu:6: BG_4a/ rūpa-trayam rūpa-catuṣṭayam ca kṣayam dhanam vā sahitam vada āśu//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:7: BG_4c/ sva-ṛṇam kṣayam svam ca pṛthak-pṛthaktve dhana-ṛṇayos sṃkalanām avaiṣi//
GS41bijaganu:9: BG_5/ atra rūpāṇām avyaktānām ca ādya-akṣarāṇi upalakṣaṇa-artham lekhyāni/
GS41bijaganu:10: tathā yāni ūna-gatāni tāni ūrdhva-bindūni ca iti//[prose]
GS41bijaganu:12: BG_7/ saṃśodhyamānam svam ṛṇatvam eti svatvam kṣayas tad-yutis uktavat ca//
GS41bijaganu:14: BG_8/ trayāt dvayam svāt svam ṛṇāt ṛṇam ca vyastam ca saṃśodhya vada āśu śeṣam//
GS41bijaganu:16: BG_9/ svayos asvayos svam vadhas sva-ṛṇa-ghāte kṣayas//
GS41bijaganu:18: BG_10/ dhanam dhanena ṛṇam ṛṇena nighnam dvayam trayeṇa svam ṛṇena kim syāt//
GS41bijaganu:20: BG_11/ bhāga-hāre api ca evam niruktam//
GS41bijaganu:22: BG_12a/ rūpa-aṣṭakam rūpa-catuṣṭayena dhanam dhanena ṛṇam ṛṇena bhaktam/
GS41bijaganu:23: BG_12c/ ṛṇam dhanena svam ṛṇena kim syāt drutam vada idam yadi bobudhīṣi//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:24: BG_13/ kṛtis sva-ṛṇayos svam sva-mūle dhana-ṛṇe na mūlam kṣayasya asti tasya akṛtitvāt//
GS41bijaganu:26: BG_14/ dhanasya rūpa-tritayasya vargam kṣayasya ca brūhi sakhe mama āśu/
GS41bijaganu:27: BG_15/ dhana-ātmakānām adhana-ātmakānām mūlam navānām ca pṛthak vada āśu//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:29: BG_16/ kha-yoge viyoge dhana-ṛṇam tathā eva cyutam śūnya-tas tad-viparyāsam eti//
GS41bijaganu:31: BG_17/ rūoa-trayam svam kṣaya-gam ca kham ca kim syāt kha-yuktam vada kha-cyutam ca//
GS41bijaganu:33: BG_18/ vadha-ādau viyat khasya kham khena ghāte kha-hāras bhavet khena bhaktas ca rāśis//
GS41bijaganu:35: BG_19/ dvi-ghnam tri-hṛt kham kha-hṛtam trayam ca śūnyasya vargam vada me padam ca//
GS41bijaganu:37: BG_20a/ asmin vikāras kha-hareṇa rāśau api praviṣṭeṣu api niḥsṛteṣu/
GS41bijaganu:38: BG_20c/ bahuṣu api syāt laya-sṛṣṭi-kāle anante acyute bhbūta0gaṇeṣu yad-vat//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:40: BG_21a/ yāvattāvat-kālakas nīlakas anyas varṇas pītas lohitas ca etad-ādyās/
GS41bijaganu:41: BG_21c/ avyaktānām kalpitās māna-saṃjñās tad-saṃkhyānam kartum ācārya-varyais//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:42: BG_22/ yogas antaram teṣu samāna-jātyos vibhinna-jātyos ca pṛthak sthitis ca//
GS41bijaganu:44: BG_23ab/ svam avyaktam ekam sakhe sa-eka-rūpam dhana-avyakta-yugmam vi-rūpa-aṣṭakam ca/
GS41bijaganu:45: BG_23cd/ yutau pakṣayos etayos kim dhana-ṛṇe viparyasya ca aikye bhavet kim vada āśu//
GS41bijaganu:47: BG_24/ dhana-avyakta-varga-trayam sa-tri-rūpam kṣaya-avyakta-yugmena yuktam ca kim syāt//
GS41bijaganu:49: BG_25/ dhana-avyakta-yugmāt ṛṇa-avyakta-ṣaṭkam sa-rūpa-aṣṭakam projjhya śeṣam vada āśu//
GS41bijaganu:51: BG_26a/ syāt rūpa-varṇa-abhihatau tu varṇas dvi-tri-ādikānām sama-jātikānām//
GS41bijaganu:53: BG_26c/ vadhe tu tad-varga-ghana-ādayas syus tad-bhāvitam ca asama-jāti-ghāte/
GS41bijaganu:54: BG_26e/ bhāga-ādikam rūpa-vat eva śeṣam vyakte yad uktam gaṇite tad atra//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:55: BG_27a/ guṇyas pṛthak guṇa-khaṇḍa-samas niveśyas tais khaṇḍakais krama-hatas sahitas yathā-uktyā/
GS41bijaganu:56: BG_27c/ avyakta-varga-karaṇī-guṇanāsu cintyas vyakta-ukta-khaṇḍa-guṇanā-vidhis evam atra//
GS41bijaganu:58: BG_28a/ yāvattāvat-pañcakam vi-eka-rūpam yāvattāvadbhis tribhis sa-dvi-rūpais/
GS41bijaganu:59: BG_28c/ saṃguṇya drāk brūhi guṇyam guṇam vā vyastam sva-ṛṇam kalpayitvā ca vidvan//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:60: BG_29a/ bhājyāt chedas śudhyati pracyutas san sveṣu sthānakeṣu krameṇa/
GS41bijaganu:61: BG_29c/ yais yais varṇais saṃguṇas yais ca rūpais bhāga-hāre labdhayas tās syus atra//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:62: BG_30/ rūpais ṣaḍbhis varjitānām caturṇām avyaktānām brūhi vargam sakhe me/[śālinī-ab]
GS41bijaganu:63: BG_31a/ kṛtibhyas ādāya padāni teṣām dvayos dvayos ca abhihatim dvi-nighnīm/
GS41bijaganu:64: BG_31c/ śeṣāt tyajet rūpa-padam gṛhītvā ced santi rūpāṇi tathā eva śeṣam//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:66: BG_32c/ dvi-tri-eka-mitais kṣaya-gais sahitās rahitās kati syus tais//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:67: BG_33a/ yāvattāvat-trayam ṛṇam ṛṇam kālakau nīlakas svam rūpeṇa āḍhyās dvi-guṇita-mitais tais tu tais eva nighnās/
GS41bijaganu:68: BG_33c/ kim syāt teṣām guṇana-ja-phalam guṇya-bhaktam ca kim syāt guṇyasya atha prakathaya kṛtim mūlam asyās kṛtes ca//
GS41bijaganu:71: BG_34a/ yogam karaṇyos mahatīm prakalpya ghātasya mūlam dvi-guṇam laghum ca/
GS41bijaganu:72: BG_34c/ yoga-antare rūpa-vat etayos te vargeṇa vargam guṇayet bhajet ca//
GS41bijaganu:74: BG_34e/ laghvyā hṛtāyās tu padam mahatyā sa-ekam nir-ekam sva-hatam laghu-ghnam/
GS41bijaganu:75: BG_34g/ yoga-antare stas kramaśas tayos vā pṛthak-sthitis syāt yadi na asti mūlam//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:76: BG_35a/ dvika-aṣṭa-mityos tri-bha-saṃkhyayos ca yoga-antare brūhi sakhe karaṇyos/
GS41bijaganu:78: tri-sapta-mityos ca ciram vicintya ced ṣaṣ-vidham vetsi sakhe karaṇyās//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:79: BG_36a/ dvi-tri-aṣṭa-saṃkhyā-guṇakas karaṇyos guṇyas tri-saṃkhyā ca sa-pañca-rūpā/
GS41bijaganu:80: BG_36c/ vadham pracakṣva āśu vi-pañca-rūpe guṇe atha vā tri-arka-mite karaṇyau//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:81: BG_37a/ kṣayas bhavet ca kṣaya-rūpa-vargas ced sādhyate asau karaṇītva-hetos/
GS41bijaganu:83: ṛṇa-ātnikāyās ca tathā karaṇyās mūlam kṣayas rūpa-vidhāna-hetos//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:84: BG_38a/ dhana-ṛṇa-tā-vyatyayam īpsitāyās chede karaṇyās asakṛt vidhāya/
GS41bijaganu:85: BG_38c/ tādṛś chidā bhājya-harau nihanyāt ekā eva yāvat karaṇī hare syāt//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:86: BG_38e/ bhājyās tayā bhājya-gatās karaṇyas labdhās karaṇyas yadi yoga-jās syus/
GS41bijaganu:88: viśleṣa-sūtreṇa pṛthak ca kāryā yathā tathā praṣṭus abhīpsitās syus//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:89: BG_39a/ vargeṇa yoga-karaṇī vihṛtā viśudhyet khaṇḍāni tad-kṛti-padasya yathā-īpsitāni/
GS41bijaganu:90: BG_39c/ kṛtvā tadīya-kṛtayas khalu pūrva-labdhyā kṣuṇṇās bhavanti pṛthak evam imās karaṇyas//
GS41bijaganu:92: BG_40a/ dvika-tri-pañca-pramitās karaṇyas tāsām kṛtim dvi-trika-saṃkhyayos ca/
GS41bijaganu:93: BG_40c/ ṣaṣ-pañcaka-dvi-trika-saṃmitānām pṛthak pṛthak me kathaya āśu vidvan//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:94: BG_40e/ aṣṭādaśa-aṣṭa-dvika-saṃmitānām kṛtī kṛtīnām ca sakhe padāni//
GS41bijaganu:96: BG_41a/ varge karaṇyās yadi vā karaṇyos tulyāni rūpāṇi atha vā bahūnām/
GS41bijaganu:97: BG_41c/ viśodhayet rūpa-kṛtes padena śeṣasya rūpāṇi yuta-ūnitāni//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:98: BG_41e/ pṛthak tad-ardhe karaṇī-dvayam syāt mūle atha bahvī karaṇī tayos yā/
GS41bijaganu:99: BG_41g/ rūpāṇi tāni evam atas api bhūyas śeṣās karaṇyas yadi santi varge//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:100: BG_42a/ ṛṇa-ātmikā ced karaṇī kṛtau syāt dhana-ātmikām tām parikalpya sādhye/
GS41bijaganu:101: BG_42c/ mūle karaṇyau anayos abhīṣṭā kṣaya-ātmikā ekā su-dhiyā avagamyā//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:102: BG_43a/ tri-sapta-mityos vada me karaṇyos viśleṣa-vargam kṛtitas padam ca/
GS41bijaganu:104: BG_43c/ dvika-tri-pañca-pramitās karaṇyas sva-sva-ṛṇa-gās vyasta-dhana-ṛṇa-gās vā/
GS41bijaganu:105: BG_43e/ tāsām kṛtim brūhi kṛtes padam ca ced ṣaṣ-vidham vetsi sakhe karaṇyās//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:108: BG_44e/ karaṇī-ṣaṭke tisṛṇām daśasu catasṛṇām tithiṣu ca pañcānām/
GS41bijaganu:109: BG_44g/ rūpa-kṛtes projjhya padam grāhyam ced anyathā na sat kva api//[gīti]
GS41bijaganu:111: BG_44k/ yāsām apavartas syāt rūpa-kṛtes tās viśodhyās syus//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:112: BG_44m/ apavarte yās labdhās mūla-karaṇyas bhavanti tās ca api/
GS41bijaganu:113: BG_44o/ śeṣa-vidhinā na yadi tās bhavanti mūlam tadā tad asat//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:114: BG_45a/ varge yatra karaṇyas dantais 32 siddhais 24 gajais 8 mitās vidvan/
GS41bijaganu:115: BG_45c/ rūpais daśabhis upetās kim mūlam brūhi tasya syāt//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:116: BG_46a/ varge yatra karaṇyas tithi-viśva-hutāśanais catur-guṇitais/
GS41bijaganu:117: BG_46c/ tulyās daśa-rūpa-āḍhyās kim mūlam brūhi tasya syāt//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:118: BG_47a/ aṣṭau ṣaṣ pañcāśat ṣaṣṭis karaṇī-trayam kṛtau yatra/
GS41bijaganu:119: BG_47c/ rūpais daśabhis upetam kim mūlam brūhi tasya syāt//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:120: BG_48a/ catur-guṇās sūrya-tithīṣu rudra-nāga-ṛtavas yatra kṛtau karaṇyas/
GS41bijaganu:121: BG_48c/ sa-viśava-rūpās vada tad-padam te yadi asti bīje paṭutā-abhimānas//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:123: BG_49c/ saptadaśa-rūpa-yuktās tatra krtau kim padam brūhi//[upagīti]
GS41bijaganu:125: BG_50a/ bhājyas hāras kṣepakas ca apavartyas kena api ādau saṃbhave kuṭṭaka-artham/
GS41bijaganu:126: BG_50c/ yena chinnau bhājya-hārau na tena kṣepas ca etad duṣṭam uddiṣṭam eva//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:127: BG_51a/ parasparam bhājitayos yayos yas śeṣas tayos syāt apavartanam sas/
GS41bijaganu:128: BG_51c/ tena apavartena vibhājitau yau tau bhājya-hārau dṛḍha-saṃjñakau stas//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:129: BG_51e/ mithas bhajet tau dṛḍha-bhājya-hārau yāvat vibhājye bhavati iha rūpam/
GS41bijaganu:130: BG_51g/ phalāni adhas adhas tad-adhas niveśyas kṣepas tathā ante kham upāntimena//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:131: BG_51i/ sva-ūrdhve hate antyena yute tad-antyam tyajet muhus syāt iti rāśi-yugmam/
GS41bijaganu:132: BG_51k/ ūrdhvas vibhājyena dṛḍhena taṣṭas phalam guṇas syāt aparas hareṇa//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:133: BG_52a/ evam tadā eva atra yadā samās tās syus labdhayas ced viṣamās tadānīm/
GS41bijaganu:134: BG_52c/ yathā āgatau labdhi-guṇau viśodhyau sva-takṣaṇāt śeṣa-mitau tu tau stas//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:135: BG_53a/ bhavati kuṭṭa-vidhes yuti-bhājyayos samapavartitayos api vā guṇas/
GS41bijaganu:136: BG_53c/ bhavati yas yuti-bhājakayos punar sas ca bhavet apavartana-saṃguṇas//
GS41bijaganu:138: BG_54a/ yoga-je takṣaṇāt śuddhe guṇa-āptī stas viyoga-je/
GS41bijaganu:140: BG_55/ guṇa-labdhyos samam grāhyam dhīmatā takṣaṇe phalam/
GS41bijaganu:141: BG_56a/ hara-taṣṭe dhana-kṣepe guṇa-labdhī tu pūrva-vat//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:142: BG_56c/ kṣepa-takṣaṇa-lābha-āḍhyā labdhis śuddhau tu varjitā/
GS41bijaganu:143: BG_57a/ atha vā bhāga-hāreṇa taṣṭayos kṣepa-bhājyayos//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:144: BG_57c/ guṇas prāk-vat tatas labdhis bhājyāt hata-yuta-uddhṛtāt/
GS41bijaganu:145: BG_58a/ kṣepa=abhāvas atha vā yatra kṣepas śudhyet hara-uddhṛtas//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:146: BG_58c/ jñeyas śūnyam guṇas tatra kṣepas hara-hṛtas phalam//
GS41bijaganu:148: BG_59/ iṣṭa-āhata-sva-sva-hareṇa yukte te vā bhavetām bahudhā guṇa-āptī//
GS41bijaganu:150: BG_60a/ ekaviṃśati-yutam śata-dvayam yad-guṇam gaṇaka pañcaṣaṣṭi-yuj/
GS41bijaganu:151: BG_60c/ pañca-varjita-śata-dvaya-uddhṛtam śuddhim eti guṇakam vada āśu tam//
GS41bijaganu:153: BG_61a/ śatam hatam yena yutam navatyā vivarjitam vā vihṛtam triṣaṣṭyā/
GS41bijaganu:154: BG_61c/ nir-agrakam syāt vada me guṇam tam spaṣṭam paṭīyān yadi kuṭṭake asi//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:155: BG_62a/ yad-guṇā akṣaya-ga-ṣaṣṭis anvitā varjitā ca yadi vā tribhis tatas/
GS41bijaganu:156: BG_62c/ syāt trayodaśa-hṛtā nir-agrakā tam guṇam gaṇaka me pṛthak vada//
GS41bijaganu:158: BG_63a/ aṣṭādaśa guṇās kena daśa-āḍhyās vā daśa-ūnitās//
GS41bijaganu:162: BG_64c/ varjitās vā tribhis bhaktās nir-agrakās syus sas kas guṇas//
GS41bijaganu:164: BG_65a/ yena pañca guṇitās kha-saṃyutās pañcaṣaṣṭi-sahitās ca te atha vā/
GS41bijaganu:165: BG_65c/ syus trayodaśa hṛtā nir-agrakās tam guṇam gaṇaka kīrtaya āśu me//
GS41bijaganu:167: BG_66a/ kṣepam viśuddhim parikalpya rūpam pṛthak tayos ye guṇa-kāra-labdhī//
GS41bijaganu:169: BG_66c/ abhīpsita-kṣepa-viśuddhi-nighne sva-hāra-taṣṭe bhavatas tayos te/
GS41bijaganu:170: BG_67a/ kaalpyā atha śuddhis vikalā-avaśeṣam ṣaṣṭis ca bhājyas ku-dināni hāras//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:171: BG_67c/ tad-jam phalam syus vikalās guṇas tu liptā-agram asmāt ca kalā-lava-agram/
GS41bijaganu:172: BG_67e/ evam tad-ūrdhvam ca tathā adhimāsa-avama-agrakābhyas divasās ravi-indvos//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:173: BG_68a/ ekas haras ced guṇakau vibhinnau tadā guṇa-aikyam parikalpya bhājyam/
GS41bijaganu:174: BG_68c/ agra-aikyam agram kṛtas ukta-vat yas saṃśliṣṭa-saṃjñas sphuṭa-kuṭṭakas asau//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:175: BG_69a/ kas pañca-nighnas vihṛtas triṣaṣṭyā sapta avaśeṣas atha sas eva rāśis/
GS41bijaganu:176: BG_69c/ daśa-āhatas syāt vihṛtas triṣaṣṭyā caturdaśa agras vada rāśim enam//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:178: BG_70a/ iṣṭam hrasvam tasya vargas prakṛtyā kṣuṇṇas yuktas varjitas vā sas yena/
GS41bijaganu:179: BG_70c/ mūlam dadyāt kṣepakam tam dhana-ṛṇam mūlam tad ca jyeṣṭha-mūlam vadanti//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:180: BG_71a/ hrasva-jyeṣṭha-kṣepakān nyasya teṣām tān anyān vā adhas niveśya krameṇa/
GS41bijaganu:181: BG_71c/ sādhyāni ebhyas bhāvanābhis bahūni mūlāni eṣām bhāvanā procyate atas//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:182: BG_71e/ vajra-abhyāsau jyeṣṭha-laghvos tad-aikyam hrasvam laghvos āhatis ca prakṛtyā/
GS41bijaganu:183: BG_71g/ kṣuṇṇā jyeṣṭha-abhyāsa-yuj jyeṣṭha-mūlam tatra abhyāsas kṣepayos kṣepakas syāt//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:184: BG_71i/ hrasvam vajra-abhyāsayos antaram vā laghvos ghātas yas prakṛtyā vinighnas/
GS41bijaganu:186: ghātas yas ca jyeṣṭhayos tad-viyogas jyeṣṭham kṣepas atra api ca kṣepa-ghātas//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:187: BG_72a/ iṣṭa-varga-hatas kṣepas kṣepas syāt iṣṭa-bhājite/
GS41bijaganu:188: BG_72c/ mūle te stas atha vā kṣepas kṣuṇṇas kṣuṇṇe tadā pade//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:189: BG_73a/ iṣṭa-varga-prakṛtyos yad vivaram tena vā bhajet/
GS41bijaganu:191: BG_73c/ dvi-ghnam iṣṭam kaniṣṭham tad padam syāt eka-saṃyutau/
GS41bijaganu:192: BG_73e/ tatas jyeṣṭham iha ānantyam bhāvanātas tathā iṣṭatas//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:193: BG_74a/ kas vargas aṣṭa-hatas sa-ekas kṛtis syāt gaṇaka ucyatām/
GS41bijaganu:194: BG_74c/ ekādaśa-guṇas kas vā vargas sa-ekas kṛtis sakhe//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:196: BG_75c/ kṛtvā kalpyas guṇas tatra tathā prakṛtitas cyute//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:197: BG_75e/ guṇa-varge prakṛti-ūne atha vā alpam śeṣakam yathā/
GS41bijaganu:198: BG_75g/ tat tu kṣepa-hṛtam kṣepas vyastas prakṛtitas cyute//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:199: BG_75i/ guṇa-labdhis padam hrasvam tatas jyeṣṭham atas asakṛt/
GS41bijaganu:200: BG_75k/ tyaktvā pūrva-pada-kṣepān cakra-vālam idam jagus//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:201: BG_75m/ catur-dvi-eka-yutau evam abhinne bhavatas pade/
GS41bijaganu:203: BG_76a/ kā saptaṣaṣṭi-guṇitā kṛtis eka-yutā kā ca ekaṣaṣṭi-nihatā ca sakhe sa-rūpā/
GS41bijaganu:204: BG_76c/ syāt mūla-dā yadi kṛti-prakṛtis nitāntam tvad-cetasi pravada tāta tatā-latā-vat//
GS41bijaganu:206: BG_77/ rūpa-śuddhau khila uddiṣṭam varga-yogas guṇas na ced/
GS41bijaganu:207: BG_78a/ akhile kṛti-mūlābhyām dvidhā rūpam vibhājitam//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:208: BG_78c/ dvidhā hrasva-padam jyeṣṭham tatas rūpa-viśodhane/
GS41bijaganu:209: BG_78e/ pūrvavat vā prasādhyete pade rūpa-viśodhane//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:210: BG_79a/ trayodaśa-guṇas vargas nir-ekas kas kṛtis bhavet/
GS41bijaganu:211: BG_79c/ kas vā aṣṭa-guṇitas vargas nir-ekas mūla-das vada//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:212: BG_80a/ kas vargas ṣaṣ-guṇas tri-āḍhyas dvādaśa-āḍhyas atha vā kṛtis/
GS41bijaganu:213: BG_80c/ yutas vā pañcasaptatyā triśatyā vā kṛtis bhavet//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:214: BG_81a/ sva-buddhyā eva pade jñeye bahu-kṣepa-viśodhane/
GS41bijaganu:216: BG_82/ varga-chinne guṇe hrasvam tad-padena vibhājayet/
GS41bijaganu:217: BG_83/ dvātriṃśat-guṇitas vargas kas sa-ekas mūla-das vada//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:218: BG_84a/ iṣṭa-bhaktas dvidhā kṣepas iṣṭa-ūna-āḍhyas dalī-kṛtas/
GS41bijaganu:219: BG_84c/ guṇa-mūla-hṛtas ca ādyas hrasva-jyeṣṭhe kramāt pade//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:220: BG_85a/ kā kṛtis navabhis kṣuṇṇā dvipañcāśat-yutā kṛtis/
GS41bijaganu:221: BG_85c/ kas vā catur-guṇas vargas trayastriṃśat-yutā kṛtis//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:223: BG_86c/ trayodaśa-yutas vā syāt vargas eva nigadyatām//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:224: BG_87a/ ṛṇa-gais pañcabhis kṣuṇṇas kas vargas sa-ekaviṃśatis/
GS41bijaganu:225: BG_87c/ vargas syāt vada ced vetsi kṣaya-ga-prakṛtau vidhim//[anuṣṭubh]
GS41bijaganu:226: BG_88a/ uktam bīja-upayogī idam saṃkṣiptam gaṇitam kila/
GS41bijaganu:229: BG_89a/ yāvattāvat kalpyam avyakta-rāśes mānam tasmin kurvatā uddiṣṭam eva/
GS41bijaganu:230: BG_89c/ tulyau pakṣau sādhanīyau prayatnāt tyaktvā kṣiptvā vā api saṃguṇya bhaktvā//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:231: BG_89e/ eka-avyaktam śodhayet anya-pakṣāt rūpāṇi anyasya itarasmāt ca pakṣāt/
GS41bijaganu:232: BG_89g/ śeṣa-avyakte na uddharet rūpa-śeṣam vyaktam mānam jāyate vyakta-rāśes//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:233: BG_89i/ avyaktānām dvi-ādikānām api iha yāvattāvat dvi-ādi-nighnam hṛtam vā/
GS41bijaganu:234: BG_89k/ yukta-ūnam vā kalpayet ātma-buddhyā mānam kva api vyaktam evam viditvā//[śālinī]
GS41bijaganu:235: BG_90a/ ekasya rūpa-triśatī ṣaṭ aśvās aśvās daśa anyasya tu tulya-maulyās/
GS41bijaganu:236: BG_90c/ ṛṇam tathā rūpa-śatam ca yasya tau tulya-vittau ca kim aśva-maulyam//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:237: BG_91a/ yat ādya-vittasya dalam dvi-yuktam tad-tulya-vittas yadi vā dvitīyas/
GS41bijaganu:238: BG_91c/ ādyas dhanena tri-guṇas anyatas vā pṛthak pṛthak me vada vāji-maulyam//[upajāti]
GS41bijaganu:239: BG_92a/ māṇikya-amala-nīla-mauktika-mitis pañca aṣṭa sapta kramāt ekasya anyatarasya sapta nava ṣaṭ tad-ratna-saṃkhyā sakhe/
GS41bijaganu:240: BG_92c/ rūpāṇām navatis dvi-ṣaṣṭis anayos tau tulya-vittau tathā bīja-jña prati-ratna-jāni su-mate maulyāni śīghram vada//
GS41bijaganu:242: BG_93a/ ekas bravīti mama dehi atam dhanena tvattas bhavāmi hi sakhe dvi-guṇas tatas anyas/
GS41bijaganu:243: BG_93c/ brūte daśa arpayasi ced mama ṣaṣ-guṇas aham tvattas tayos vada dhane mama kim-pramāṇe//
GS41bijaganu:245: BG_94a/ māṇikya-aṣṭakam indranīla-daśakam muktāphalānām śatam yat te karṇa-vibhūṣaṇe sama-dhanam krītam tvad-arthe mayā/
GS41bijaganu:246: BG_94c/ tad-ratna-traya-maulya-saṃyuti-mitis tri-ūnam śata-ardham priye maulyam brūhi pṛthak yadi iha gaṇite kalpā asi kalyāṇini//
GS41bijaganu:248: BG_95a/ pañca-aṃśas ali-kulāt kadambam agamat tri-aṃśas śilīndhram tayos viśleṣas tri-guṇas mṛga-akṣi kuṭajam dolāyamānas aparas/
GS41bijaganu:249: BG_95c/ kānte ketaka-mālatī-parimala-prāpta-eka-kāla-priyāt dūta-āhūtas itas tatas bhramati khe bhṛṅgas ali-saṃkhyām vada//
GS41bijaganu:251: BG_96a/ pañcaka-śata-datta-dhanāt phalasya vargam viśodhya pariśiṣṭam/
GS41bijaganu:252: BG_96c/ dattam daśaka-śatena tulyas kālas phalam ca tayos//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:253: BG_97a/ eka-śata-datta-dhanāt phalasya vargam viśodhya pariśiṣṭam/
GS41bijaganu:254: BG_97c/ pañcaka-śatena dattam tulyas kālas phalam ca tayos//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:255: BG_98a/ māṇikya-aṣṭakam indranīla-daśakam muktāphalānām śatam sat-vajrāṇi ca pañca ratna-vaṇijām yeṣām caturṇām dhanam/
GS41bijaganu:256: BG_98c/ saṅga-sneha-vaśena te nija-dhanāt dattvā ekam ekam mithas jātās tulya-dhanās pṛthak vada sakhe tad-ratna-maulyāni me//
GS41bijaganu:258: BG_99a/ pañcaka-śatena dattam mūlam sa-kalāntaram gate varṣe/
GS41bijaganu:259: BG_99c/ dvi-guṇam ṣoḍaśa-hīnam labdham kim mūlam ācakṣva//[āryā]
GS41bijaganu:260: BG_100a/ yat pañcaka-dvika-catuṣka-śatena dattam khaṇḍais tribhis navati-yuj triśatī dhanam tat/
GS41bijaganu:261: BG_100c/ māseṣu sapta-daśa-pañcasu tulyam āptam khaṇḍa-traye api sa-phalam vada khaṇḍa-saṃkhyām//
GS41bijaganu:263: BG_101a/ pura-praveśe daśa-das dvi-saṃguṇam vidhāya śeṣam daśa-bhuk ca nirgame/
GS41bijaganu:264: BG_101c/ dadau daśa evam nagara-traye abhavat tri-nighnam ādyam vada tat kiyat dhanam//
GS41bijaganu:265: BG_102a/ sa=ardham tandula-mānaka-trayam aho drammeṇa māna-aṣṭakam mudgānām ca yadi trayodaśa-mitās etās vaṇik kākiṇīs/
GS41bijaganu:266: BG_102c/ ādāya arpaya tandula-aṃśa-yugalam mudga-eka-bhāga-anvitam kṣipram kṣipra-bhujas vrajema hi yutas sa-arthas agratas yāsyati//
GS41bijaganu:267: BG_103a/ sva-ardha-pañca-aṃśa-navamais yuktās ke syus samās trayas/
GS41bijaganu:268: BG_103c/ anya-aṃśa-dvaya-hīnās ye ṣaṣṭi-śeṣās ca tān vada//
GS41bijaganu:269: BG_104a/ trayodaśa tathā pañca karaṇyau bhujayos mitī/
GS41bijaganu:270: BG_104c/ bhūs ajñātā atra catvāras phalam bhūmim vada āśu me//
GS41bijaganu:271: BG_105a/ daśa-pañca-karaṇī-antaram ekas bāhus paras ca ṣaṭ karaṇī/
GS41bijaganu:272: BG_105c/ bhūs aṣṭādaśa karaṇī rūpa-ūnā lambam ācakṣva//
GS41bijaganu:273: BG_106a/ asamāna-sama-chedān rāśīn tān caturas vada/
GS41bijaganu:274: BG_106c/ yad-aikyam yad-ghana-aikyam vā yeṣām varg-aikya-saṃmitam//
GS41bijaganu:276: BG_107a/ tri-asra-kṣetrasya yasya syāt phalam karṇena saṃmitam/
GS41bijaganu:277: BG_107c/ dos-koṭi-śruti-ghātena samam yasya ca tad-vat//
GS41bijaganu:278: BG_108a/ yutau vargas antare vargas yayos ghāte ghanas bhavet/
GS41bijaganu:279: BG_108c/ tau rāśī śīghram ācakṣva dakṣas asi gaṇite yadi//
GS41bijaganu:280: BG_109a/ ghana-aikyam jāyate vargas varga-aikyam ca yayos ghanas/
GS41bijaganu:281: BG_109c/ tau ced vetsi tadā aham tvām manye bīja-vidām varam//
GS41bijaganu:282: BG_110a/ yatra tri-asre kṣetre dhātrī manu-saṃmitā sakhe bāhū/
GS41bijaganu:283: BG_110c/ ekas pañcadaśa anyas trayodaśa vada avalambakam tatra//
GS41bijaganu:284: BG_111a/ yadi sama-bhuvi veṇus dvi-tri-pāṇi-pramāṇas gaṇaka pavana-vegāt eka-deśe su-bhagnas/
GS41bijaganu:285: BG_111c/ bhuvi nṛpa-mita-hasteṣu aṅga lagnam tad-agram kathaya katiṣu mūlāt eṣas bhagnas kareṣu//
GS41bijaganu:286: BG_112a/ cakra-krauñca-ākulita-salile kva api dṛṣṭam taḍāge toyāt ūrdhvam kamala-kalikā-agram vitasti-pramāṇam/
GS41bijaganu:287: BG_112c/ mandam mandam calitam anilena āhatam hasta-yugme tasmin magnam gaṇaka kathaya kṣipram ambu-pramāṇam//
GS41bijaganu:288: BG_113a/ vṛkṣāt hasta-śata-ucchrayāt śata-yuge vāpīm kapis kas api agāt uttīrya atha paras drutam śruti-pathāt proḍḍīya kiṃcit drumāt/
GS41bijaganu:290: BG_113c/ jātā evam samatā tayos yadi gatau uḍḍīya-mānam kiyat vidvan ced su-pariśramas asti gaṇite kṣipram tat ācakṣva me//
GS41bijaganu:294: BG_115a/ avyakta-varga-ādi yadā avaśeṣam pakṣau tadā iṣṭena nihatya kiṃcit/
GS41bijaganu:295: BG_115c/ kṣepyam tayos yena pada-pradas syāt avyakta-pakṣasya padena bhūyas//
GS41bijaganu:296: BG_115e/ vyaktasya pakṣasya sama-kriyā evam avyakta-mānam khalu labhyate tat/
GS41bijaganu:297: BG_115g/ na nirvahas ced ghana-varga-vargeṣu evam tadā jñeyam idam sva-buddhyā//
GS41bijaganu:298: BG_115i/avyakta-mūla-ṛṇa-ga-rūpatas alpam vyaktasya pakṣasya padam yadi syāt/
GS41bijaganu:299: BG_115k/ ṛṇam dhanam tat ca vidhāya sādhyam avyakta-mānam dvi-vidham kvacit tat//
GS41bijaganu:301: BG_116c/ pūrva-avyaktasya kṛtes sama-rūpāṇi kṣipet tayos eva//
GS41bijaganu:302: BG_117a/ ali-kula-dala-mūlam mālatīm yātam aṣṭau nikhila-navama-bhāgās cālinī bhṛṅgam ekam/
GS41bijaganu:303: BG_117c/ niśi parimala-lubdham padma-madhye niruddham pratiraṇati raṇantam brūhi kānte ali-saṃkhyām//
GS41bijaganu:304: BG_118a/ pārthas karṇa-vadhāya mārgaṇa-gaṇam kruddhas raṇe saṃdadhe tasya ardhena nivārya tad-śara-gaṇam mūlais caturbhis hayān/
GS41bijaganu:305: BG_118c/ śalyam ṣaḍbhis atha iṣubhis tribhis api chatram dhvajam kārmukam ciccheda asya śiras śareṇa kati te yān arjunas saṃdadhe//
GS41bijaganu:306: BG_119a/ vi-ekasya gacchasya dalam kila ādis ādes dalam tad-pracayas phalam ca/
GS41bijaganu:308: BG_120a/ kas khena vihṛtas rāśis koṭyā yuktas atha vā ūnitas/
GS41bijaganu:309: BG_120c/ vargitas sva-padena āḍhyas kha-guṇas navatis bhavet//
GS41bijaganu:310: BG_121a/ kas sva-ardha-sahitas rāśis kha-guṇas vargitas yutas/
GS41bijaganu:311: BG_121c/ sva-padābhyām sva-bhaktas ca jātas pañcadaśa ucyatām//
GS41bijaganu:312: BG_122a/ rāśis dvādaśa-nighnas rāśi-ghana-āḍhyas ca kas samas yasya/
GS41bijaganu:314: BG_123a/ kas rāśis dviśatī-kṣuṇṇas rāśi-varga-yutas hatas/
GS41bijaganu:315: BG_123c/ dvābhyām tena ūnitas rāśi-varga-vargas ayutam 10000 bhavet/
GS41bijaganu:316: BG_123e/ rūpa-ūnam vada tam rāśim vetsi bīja-kriyām yadi//
GS41bijaganu:317: BG_124a/ vana-antarāle plavaga-aṣṭa-bhāgas saṃvargitas valgati jāta-rāgas/
GS41bijaganu:318: BG_124c/ brūt-kāra-nāda-pratināda-hṛṣṭās dṛṣṭās girau dvādaśa te kiyantas//
GS41bijaganu:319: BG_125a/ yūthāt pañca-aṃśakas tri-ūnas vargitas gahvaram gatas/
GS41bijaganu:320: BG_125c/ dṛṣṭas śākhā-mṛgas śākhām ārūḍhas vada te kati/
GS41bijaganu:322: BG_125g/ caturdaśa-aṅgulā jātā gaṇaka brūhi tām drutam//
GS41bijaganu:323: BG_126a/ catvāras rāśayas ke te mūla-dās ye dvi-saṃyutās
GS41bijaganu:324: BG_126c/ dvayos dvayos yathā āsanna-ghātās ca aṣṭādaśa-anvitās/
GS41bijaganu:326: BG_126g/ trayodaśa sakhe jātam bīja-jña vada tān mama//
GS41bijaganu:327: BG_127a/ rāśi-kṣepāt vadha-kṣepas yad-guṇas tat pada-uttaram/
GS41bijaganu:329: BG_128a/ kṣetre tithi-nakhais tulye dos-koṭī tatra kā śrutis/
GS41bijaganu:330: BG_128c/ upapattis ca rūḍhasya gaṇitasya asya kathyatām//
GS41bijaganu:332: BG_129c/ varga-yoga-samas sas syāt dvayos avyaktayos yathā//
GS41bijaganu:333: BG_130a/ bhujāt tri-ūnāt padam vi-ekam koṭi-karṇa-antaram sakhe/
GS41bijaganu:334: BG_130c/ yatra tatra vada kṣetre dos-koṭi-śravaṇān mama//
GS41bijaganu:335: BG_131a/ varga-yogasya yad-rāśyos yuti-vargasya ca antaram/
GS41bijaganu:336: BG_131c/ dvi-ghna-ghāta-samānam syāt dvayos avyaktayos yathā/
GS41bijaganu:337: BG_131e/ catur-guṇasya ghātasya yuti-vargasya ca antaram/
GS41bijaganu:338: BG_131g/ rāśi-antara-kṛtes tulyam dvayos avyaktayos yathā//
GS41bijaganu:339: BG_132a/ catvāriṃśat yutis yeṣām dos-koṭi-śravasām vada/
GS41bijaganu:341: BG_133a/ yogas dos-koṭi-karṇānām ṣaṭpañcāśat 56 vadhas tathā/
GS41bijaganu:342: BG_133c/ ṣaṭśatī saptabhis kṣuṇṇā 4200 yeṣām tān me pṛthak vada//
GS41bijaganu:344: BG_134a/ ādyam varṇam śodhayet anya-pakṣāt anyān rūpāṇi anyatas ca ādya-bhakte/
GS41bijaganu:345: BG_134c/ pakṣe anyasmin ādya-varṇa-unmitis syāt varṇasya ekasya unmitīnām bahutve//
GS41bijaganu:346: BG_134e/ samī-kṛta-cheda-game tu tābhyas tad-anya-varṇa-unmitayas prasādhyās/
GS41bijaganu:347: BG_134g/ antya-unmitau kuṭṭaka-vidhes guṇa-āptī te bhājya-tad-bhājaka-varna-māne//
GS41bijaganu:348: BG_134i/ anye api bhājye yadi santi varṇās tad-mānam iṣṭam parikalpya sādhye/
GS41bijaganu:349: BG_134k/ vilomaka-uttāpana-tas anya-varṇa-mānāni bhinnam yadi mānam evam/
GS41bijaganu:350: BG_134m/ bhūyas kāryas kuṭṭake atra antya-varṇam tena utthāpya utthāpayet vyastam ādyāt//
GS41bijaganu:351: BG_135a/ māṇikya-amala-nīla-mauktika-mitis pañca aṣṭa sapta kramāt ekasya anyatarasya sapta nava ṣaṭ tad-ratna-saṃkhyā sakhe/
GS41bijaganu:352: BG_135c/ rūpāṇām navatis dviṣaṣṭis anayos tau tulya-vittau tathā bīja-jña prati-ratna-jāni sumate maulyāni śīghram vada//
GS41bijaganu:354: BG_136a/ ekas bravīti mama dehi śatam dhanena tvattas bhavāmi hi sakhe dvi-guṇas tatas anyas/
GS41bijaganu:355: BG_136c/ brūte daśa arpayasi ced mama ṣaṣ-guṇas aham tvattas tayos vada dhane mama kim-pramāṇe//
GS41bijaganu:356: BG_137a/ aśvās pañca-guṇa-aṅga-maṅgala-mitās yeṣām caturṇām dhanāni uṣṭrās ca dvi-muni-śruti-kṣiti-mitās aṣṭa-dvi-bhū-pāvakās/
GS41bijaganu:357: BG_137c/ teṣām aśvatarās vṛṣās muni-mahī-netra-indu-saṃkhyās kramāt sarve tulya-dhanās ca te vada sapadi aśva-ādi-maulyāni me//
GS41bijaganu:358: BG_138a/ tribhis pārāvatās pañca pañcabhis sapta sārasās/
GS41bijaganu:359: BG_138c/ saptabhis nava haṃsās ca navabhis barhiṇas trayas//
GS41bijaganu:360: BG_138e/ drammais avāpyate dramma-śatena śatam ānaya/
GS41bijaganu:362: BG_139a/ ṣaṣ-bhaktas pañca-agras pañca-vibhaktas bhavet catuṣka-agras/
GS41bijaganu:363: BG_139c/ catur-uddhṛtas trika-agras dvi-agras tri-samuddhṛtas kas syāt//
GS41bijaganu:364: BG_140a/ syus pañca-sapta-navabhis kṣuṇṇeṣu hṛteṣu keṣu viṃśatyā/
GS41bijaganu:365: BG_140c/ rūpa-uttarāṇi śeṣāṇi avāptayas ca api śeṣa-samās//
GS41bijaganu:366: BG_141a/ eka-agras dvi-hṛtas kas syāt dvika-agras tri-samuddhṛtas/
GS41bijaganu:367: BG_141c/ trika-agras pañcabhis bhaktas tad-vat eva hi labdhayas//
GS41bijaganu:368: BG_142a/ kau rāśī vada pañca-ṣaṭka-vihṛtau eka-dvika-agrau yayos dvi-agram tri-uddhṛtam antaram nava-hṛtā pañca-agrakā syāt yutis/
GS41bijaganu:369: BG_142c/ ghātas sapta-hṛtas ṣaṣ-agras iti tau ṣaṭka-aṣṭakābhyām vinā vidvan kuṭṭaka-vedi-kuñjara-ghaṭā-saṃghaṭṭa-sṃhas asi ced//
GS41bijaganu:370: BG_143a/ navabhis saptabhis kṣuṇṇas kas rāśis triṃśatā hṛtas/
GS41bijaganu:371: BG_143c/ yat agra-aikyam phala-aikya-āḍhyam bhavet ṣaḍviṃśates mitam//
GS41bijaganu:373: BG_144c/ yat agra-aikyam api triṃśat-hṛtam ekādaśa-agrakam//
GS41bijaganu:374: BG_145a/ kas trayoviṃśati-kṣuṇṇas ṣaṣṭyā asītyā hṛtas pṛthak/
GS41bijaganu:375: BG_145c/ yat agra-aikyam śatam dṛṣṭam kuṭṭaka-jña vada āśu tam//
GS41bijaganu:376: BG_146a/ atra adhikasya varṇasya bhājyasthasya īpsitā mitis/
GS41bijaganu:377: BG_146c/ bhāga-labdhasya no kalpyā kriyā vyabhicaret tathā//
GS41bijaganu:379: BG_147c/ yat labdham rāśinā yuktam triṃśat jātam vada āśu tam//
GS41bijaganu:380: BG_148a/ ṣaṣ-aṣṭa-śatakās krītvā sama-ardhena phalāni ye/
GS41bijaganu:381: BG_148c/ vikrīya ca punar śeṣam eka-ekam pañcabhis paṇais/
GS41bijaganu:382: BG_148e/ jātās sama-paṇās teṣām kas krayas vikrayas ca kas//
GS41bijaganu:384: BG_149a/ varga-ādyam ced tulya-śuddhau kṛtāyām pakṣasya ekasya ukta-vat varga-mūlam/
GS41bijaganu:385: BG_149c/ varga-prakṛtyā para-pakṣa-mūlam tayos samī-kāra-vidhis punar ca/
GS41bijaganu:386: BG_149e/ varga-prakṛtyā viṣayas na ced syāt tadā anya-varṇsya kṛtes samam tam//
GS41bijaganu:387: BG_149g/ kṛtvā aparam pakṣam atha anya-mānam kṛti-prakṛtyā ādya-mitis tathā ca/
GS41bijaganu:388: BG_149i/ varga-prakṛtyā viṣayas yathā syāt tathā sudhībhis bahudhā vicintyam//
GS41bijaganu:389: BG_150a/ bījam matis vividha-varṇa-sahāyinī hi manda-avabodhavidhaye vibudhais nija-ādyais/
